main event: A visual sighting of an unidentified object resembling a distant satellite reported on 8 June 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in the Pacific at coordinates 20 20N 174 41W., The report classifies the object as similar to a distant satellite., No photographs are included with the report., The duration of the sighting is unknown., Conclusions indicate that there is insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: one glowing object appearing like a distant satellite
